project.description: FlowTask is an AI-powered task management tool that helps remote teams and freelancers prioritize their work intelligently. Stop drowning in to-dos and start shipping what matters.
project.value_proposition: Simplify task management with AI-powered prioritization

tone_rules: Focus on user benefits, not features

hero.headline: Manage Tasks Like Never Before
hero.subheadline: FlowTask uses AI to help you prioritize what matters most. Stop drowning in to-dos and start shipping.

features.title: AI Prioritization
features.description: Let AI analyze your tasks and suggest the optimal order to tackle them.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share projects, assign tasks, and track progress in real-time with your team.

features.title: Smart Reminders
features.description: Never miss a deadline with intelligent notifications that adapt to your schedule.

testimonial.quote: FlowTask transformed how our remote team works. We shipped 40% more features last quarter and everyone feels less stressed.
testimonial.author: Sarah Chen
